header.self-description: Welcome to my web page. This page is not 100% serious and it has only been made to show my habilities with HTML, CSS, JS, REACT among others. I've made use of React.js as a framework as my Front-End tool, MongoDB as my database and NODE.js with Express as the Back-End service
